LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Explosive.label: coleira explosiva
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Explosive.descriptio:
***PERIGO EXPLOSIVO***

 Uma coleira de metal presa ao pescoço dos escravos. Quando armada e ativada explode fora a cabeça do escravo com um pequeno mas poderoso estrondo. 

***PERIGO EXPLOSIVO***
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Explosive.comps.Comp: Put the collar on the target
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Electric.label: electric collar
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Electric.description: A metal collar fastened around the necks of slaves. When activated, electrocutes wearer until unconscious.
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Electric.comps.CompU: Put the collar on the target
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Crypto.label: crypto collar
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Crypto.description: A metal collar fastened around the necks of slaves. When activated, it freezes it's wearer in place leaving them completely immobile and defenceless. Used for non-violent suppresion of slaves.
LanguageData.Apparel_SlaveCollar_Crypto.comps.CompUsa: Put the collar on the target
